creator: dbols@osirion.be
text:
The authoring area for the blog publications gives me a "Page not published 
yet" message.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: I can confirm this problem. It somehow has to be resolved for milestone 1.2.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: i can get in without problems today. reopen with more details if necessary.

creator: rudi.strasser@gmx.de
text: I also experience the same problem

creator: rudi.strasser@gmx.de
text:
I could get rid of this problem by using xalan-2.5.0 instead of xalan-2.5.1 
(as it comes with cocoon-2.1.2)

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
I encountered this error with the binary version of 1.2RC2 which was released about one week 
after this bug was closed.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: I have this problem on Linux and Windows 2000.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
more info please? no new reports have come in. if you have new info feel free to
reopen
